name: Metal Cube
description:
Tiny game I made for fun YEARS ago (2008) in DarkBASIC Professional. Was actually written in 20 lines of (compressed) DB code for the 20 line challenge. Has a Metal Gear Solid theme with stealth, action and a terrible unfinished story with fittingly bad grammar.

Features:

  • Search AI that will hunt you down if it sees or hears you
  • Hidden weapon and medical stashes
  • 10 levels including a tutorial
  • Enemy variations with different difficulty

Arrows keys to move and mouse to shoot. RMB close up is a melee attack.

Original post with source can be found here: https://forum.thegamecreators.com/thread/139314
